title: Women Who Changed the World
author: Sue Leather
desc: In the past, women did not have the same rights as men. They had no education, no fair pay and even no possibility to live a full life without a husband. Long ago the function of a woman was simple - home life and birth of children, nothing else. But there were women in history who changed the world. In this book, the author describes the history of female fight. Everything started with the question of education for girls and women. Nowadays there are women who work in education, science, politics and sport. This book clarifies not the most popular and well-known historical moments in the formation of modern society. Find out how the world came to complete equality and what obstacles women faced on their difficult path.
